scripts.clean-all: npm --prefix papiea-core run clean &&  npm --prefix papiea-engine run clean && npm --prefix papiea-sdk run clean && npm --prefix papiea-client run clean
scripts.build-all: npm --prefix papiea-core run build &&  npm --prefix papiea-engine run build && npm --prefix papiea-sdk run build && npm --prefix papiea-client run build
scripts.patch-all: npm --prefix papiea-core version patch &&  npm --prefix papiea-engine version patch && npm --prefix papiea-sdk version patch && npm --prefix papiea-client version patch
scripts.install-all: npm --prefix papiea-core install &&  npm --prefix papiea-engine install && npm --prefix papiea-sdk install && npm --prefix papiea-client install
